channel.title: Command help [Delta]

item.title: Command help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

tried making a ::give command, where it is ::give (name) (id)
here is the command so far:

if (command.startsWith("give") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("alex") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("1337") && command.startsWith("give")) { String otherPName = command.substring(5); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; String[] args = command.split("!"); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { p.addItem(newItemID, 1); p.sM(""+playerName+" Has just given you a gift!"); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::give name ! 995"); } }

The problem is that it just dcâ€™s me when i try to do it on someone

Read full topic
